name: Spectry
description:
Simple project that started as a learning prototype. But as it grow and grow the Spectry was born. Lead it through the levels which are designed to be very challenging, so don't lose your temper :) And once you get through you can challenge yourself to beat your previous level times. 

Move with A & S, jump with W and zoom out with S. Or use  Arrow keys
For powers use J and L keys.
